definition: to recount what happened prior to events already known
to chase after/to seek/to do one's utmost to seek or procure sth/to recall
abbr. for Syria 敘利亞|叙利亚[Xu4 li4 ya4]

sentences.english: FDR and Henry, Jr . reminisced about the old days over lunch.
sentences.chinese: 小亨利和羅斯福一邊共進午餐，一邊追敘昔日的生活。
